Miracle’s Enterprise Framework on Power BI
A journey towards Self-Service Analytics
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, MI - USA and has multiple Global Development Centers spanning across USA, Canada and India. As a Gold Partner of Microsoft, we offer a wide range of services in Business Intelligence and Analytics space. Today, Miracle's team includes 3000 IT Professionals, helping the clients with their data management and advanced analytics, both on the cloud and on-premise based solutions.

Power BI supports is not just for your computer, but works on your mobile too
Miracle has a well-defined framework to embed world-class analytics in various apps to deliver business intelligence (BI) in real time, wherever decisions are made. We are very glad to introduce our Enterprise Self-Service Analytics Framework on Microsoft Power BI. It defines an approach for enabling self-service analytics, multiple data models integrating data across various applications, and multiple reusable assets to get you started with your journey to self-service analytics.

One of the biggest benefits of Microsoft Power BI is that it can integrate all your enterprise data and key business metrics at one place. Microsoft Power BI includes mobile collaborative features that not only works on Windows, but also on IOS and Android.
Looking forward to discuss on how we can bring value and build a concrete strategy to your digital transformation journey.
